column1: # Surat Public Transit Data - Comprehensive Dataset
This dataset contains all available data for Surat's public transit system including:
## Dataset 3: Major Bus Stops and Stations
- **Service Pattern**: Primarily radial from Railway Station and Chowk
- **August 2024**: New CT Route 146 (Railway Station to Vesu GAIL Colony)
- **Integration with Google Maps** for route planning
2. Wikipedia - Surat Bus Rapid Transit System
- GPS coordinates are approximate based on major landmarks
- Timing data represents typical schedules (subject to updates)
- Fleet numbers are based on latest available data (2024-2025)
- Some route details may vary seasonally or due to construction activities
